bio: Norman Walsh is a Lead Engineer at MarkLogic Corporation where he works in the Application Services team. Norm is also an active participant in a number of standards efforts worldwide: he is chair of the XML Processing Model Working Group at the W3C where he is also co-chair of the XML Core Working Group. At OASIS, he is chair of the DocBook Technical Committee. With almost two decades of industry experience, Norm is well known for his work on DocBook and a wide range of open source projects. He is the author of _DocBook: The Definitive Guide_.
name: Norman Walsh
